DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to evaluate the effects of IQ-Tape, Kinesiotaping and no Taping on muscle activity during daily activity and sport activity.
DOC.brief_title: Cross Sectional Study to Evaluate Effects of Kinesiotaping on Muscle Activity During Climbing Stairs and Sport Activity
DOC.criteria: healthy able to perform daily activities and sport performance lower body and pelvic injuries fractures of the spine oder lower limb cardiac or neurological diseases
